title: Confirmed No more Taliyah skins planned for 2018.
body:
Confirmed by Riot Stellari herself on Twitter.
https://twitter.com/thejanellemj/status/1011712376490479616

Definitely won't say I'm surprised, but I am definitely disappointed. 

at least we'll have SSG to tide us over.

replies.body:
Hi,
So I actually went into this more on Twitter but people didn't see the rest of the Tweets.

We do our planning quarterly, more or less. As of *right now* July 27, 2018 we don't have one planned. 

We also don't have all the skins for 2018 planned yet, but we have the big beats.

We start planning in 2019 soon, because we know certain things: We know what Chinese Zodiac year it is. We know which Legendaries we're considering, which champ needs a skin, which new thematic we want to try.

We do not plan things for 2019 in July 2018. :)

You can see the thread here https://twitter.com/TheStarWeaver/status/1011775228584845313

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Stellari,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZAyJeXQx,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2018-06-27T17:39:09.429+0000)
>
> Hi,
> So I actually went into this more on Twitter but people didn't see the rest of the Tweets.
> 
> We do our planning quarterly, more or less. As of *right now* July 27, 2018 we don't have one planned. 
> 
> We also don't have all the skins for 2018 planned yet, but we have the big beats.
> 
> We start planning in 2019 soon, because we know certain things: We know what Chinese Zodiac year it is. We know which Legendaries we're considering, which champ needs a skin, which new thematic we want to try.
> 
> We do not plan things for 2019 in July 2018. :)
> 
> You can see the thread here https://twitter.com/TheStarWeaver/status/1011775228584845313

Wait? Isn’t it June? Shiiiii next thing you’ll say it’s not really Wednesday and actually Friday and I didn’t make any plans.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Stellari,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZAyJeXQx,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2018-06-27T17:39:09.429+0000)
>
> Hi,
> So I actually went into this more on Twitter but people didn't see the rest of the Tweets.

> We do our planning quarterly, more or less. As of *right now* July 27, 2018 we don't have one planned. 
>

> 
> We start planning in 2019 soon, because we know certain things: We know what Chinese Zodiac year it is. We know which Legendaries we're considering, which champ needs a skin, which new thematic we want to try.
> 
> We do not plan things for 2019 in July 2018. :)
> 
> You can see the thread here https://twitter.com/TheStarWeaver/status/1011775228584845313

https://www.artstation.com/artwork/1J04X was a very good chinese year jade skin concept for camille!

The next Zodiac skin should be 
Sejuani as an honorable war maiden atop a noble boar vs Kled as a little drunk festival man riding a cowardly piglet.

Please!

That's refreshing to hear. That means there's hope yet for a real Taliyah skin!

That said, how's things looking for that Aurelion Sol skin?

Itll be out in a month or so.  Within a couple patches of it will also be an Urgot skin!

One of them is going to be for a preexisting set and the other is a skin made original for the champ.
Can you give a source for this?

>P.S. The skins coming out for Aurelion Sol and Urgot in the next few months are one of each.

Ask Riot

Ah, thought you had further information since "in the next few months" and "in a month" are quite different.
And it sounded like you know that Urgot will come after Aurelion Sol.
Within a couple patches means before or after.

And, now you don't have a Taliyah skin for this year? Disappointed me Riot.

{{champion:163}} :'(

Hi Janelle! Please consider a Halloween concept for Quinn this year. She has no skins above 975 RP after five years of being released, and also a pretty sore lack of dark/spooky skins! I made a [Ravenborn concept](https://www.artstation.com/artwork/Vl15n) a while back for her that probably wouldn't work well when translated in game, but I think it's a really good fit thematically!

Some other ideas that could work too:

* [Warden Quinn](https://www.reddit.com/r/QuinnMains/comments/8u5ayz/forget_project_we_need_a_wardenthemed_quinn_skin/)
* [Hextech Quinn](https://www.artstation.com/artwork/mqz3d)
* [Raptor Knight Quinn](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/QakMNzNI-skin-concept-raptor-knight-quinn)
* Bullet Angel or PROJECT: Quinn
* Dragon Trainer Quinn
Please tell me when we will get a legendary Jayce skin? I like using the best most expensive skins for champs, and Jayce is my otp with 2 skins that are the same price and arent that much different.
"Public School Taliyah to counter the Academy snobs, imo! Keepin it real XD" what happened to something like this? {{sticker:sg-lux-2}} {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Any chance you've noticed the threads pleading for pre-Ascension/pre-Darkin skins for The Darkin after the most recent lore updates + Aatrox rework? Guardian of the Sands skins possibly?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Stellari,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZAyJeXQx,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2018-06-27T17:39:09.429+0000)
>
> Hi,
> So I actually went into this more on Twitter but people didn't see the rest of the Tweets.
> 
> We do our planning quarterly, more or less. As of *right now* July 27, 2018 we don't have one planned. 
> 
> We also don't have all the skins for 2018 planned yet, but we have the big beats.
> 
> We start planning in 2019 soon, because we know certain things: We know what Chinese Zodiac year it is. We know which Legendaries we're considering, which champ needs a skin, which new thematic we want to try.
> 
> We do not plan things for 2019 in July 2018. :)
> 
> You can see the thread here https://twitter.com/TheStarWeaver/status/1011775228584845313

Sejuani

WHOOPSYS. Well that's my fault.

I just assumed "nothing planned" and "starting for next year" implied this year is done and dusted.
I thought they said e-sports skins dont affect timeline for normal skins. wow they really dont want to give her anything

Yeah thats really a bit sad.

I mean riot went out of their way to give skins for champs that went without one for too long and now it looks like they are starting to fall back into the old pattern.

It's especially upsetting that Jhin was on the regular skins schedule TWICE last year, and his World's skin didn't impact his selection in getting the PROJECT skin later in the year. So Taliyah is apparently shit out of luck because she got a Worlds skin, but Jhin can get 2 more skins in a year without Worlds impacting his selection for skins.

e-sports doesn't really affect it tho.  She's just not up for consideration, even if they (ssg) hadn't picked her, she likely wouldn't've gotten one this year at all.   Maybe they just havent fleshed out a theme for her yet. (a unique one that doesn't copy paste other fanmade ones, e.g. poolparty/beach theme skin, as Riot likes to have some form of plausible deniability with at most slight nods to the fanmade version.)
Because Jhin needs more skins per year. No resources left for Taliyah.

And the skin team keeps on dissapointing me the whole year.
Great, be honest and say it, Skinteam: Taliyah is not popular enough to create skins for her. She will wait +3 years before she gets her first non-eSport one.

It's not popularity. Taliyah was relatively popular, especially recently with the taliyah jgl fad. If they made a skin for her then, I have little doubt that people would accuse Riot of being "money greedy corporate $cumbags"

Chogath is about to get a skin and he's not played anywhere.

Not really. Taliyah, similar to Aurelion Sol, is a high elo champion. (So her playerbase is already pretty small of it). Her kit is simple to specific for typical gamer and she has a small, but dedicated playerbase. Not consider Taliyah actually has a lot of stuff to animate, not only model and VFX/SFX like the most champion, but also a lot of animation.
She is simple not popular enough with the amount of work she gives.
But let's be honest - Kayn also has three models and I already see how he will get a skin after skin, since he sells.

Does it mean player who enjoy niche champion doesn't deserve skins? Ofc they do, but instead the skin team is creating skin for the popular champion.
I have 5 Taliyah skin concepts in mind with price ranges of 750, 975, and 1350x3. Just because she throws rocks everywhere doesn't mean you can't design around it.
sad day

She looks so cute in her skin it makes me so happy,but this kinda...blows! :( 

I was expecting at least another skin by the end of the year. but hey don't want people to say we are getting greedy. i mean we complained about lack of skin for her for so long. if we ask for another...

Oh come on.

Atleast she's getting a skin at all.

Meanwhile, my boi {{champion:136}} still doesn't have shit going for him.
Sol confirmed skin for 2018 though...

Other than Jhin, it's like they just didn't like the champs they put out in 2016/Season 6. 

Illaoi had to have a vote to get one made and even then it differed from the vote (yet the others were good ideas too but they won't ever happen).
Sol is still waiting.
Taliyah can only get a skin by a World winner asking for one, if she isn't in the plans without him it would have been until 2019 before she got a skin
Kled, Ivern are great champs but their popularity would mean they'll get as many skins as Yorick at this rate.
Camille is hugely popular, big in pro but also still dosn't have one.

In the mean time, Xayah and Rakan will have 2 already, Zoe is getting one because the idea of beach party was good (not like people weren't talking about a Taliyah beach party skin when she came out, riding on a boogie board with her passive and stuff... oh no). I can see Kai'Sa and Kayn getting skins before Kled and Ivern.
wait Zoe is getting a skin? It's the pool party themed? ._. oh no.

It was in the early year video where they discussed plans for skins for 2018, and confirmed Amumu and A.Sol skins. To be fair, Pool Party Zoe is super adorable. They already had video of that skin back in like Feb.
My worries > Skin for Zoe > Looks Good > more People play zoe for little bit > Seeing Zoe... ._.
{{champion:516}}  {{champion:240}}

> [{quoted}](name=Darkone7001,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZAyJeXQx,comment-id=00020002,timestamp=2018-06-27T17:44:57.960+0000)
>
> {{champion:516}}  {{champion:240}}

Hello darkness my old friend...

Remember when epsorts skins didnt affect skinlines

Riot doesnt remember.

Like many of us have been saying for years now, they twist their words and take credit for decisions and actions not actually made by them. They are cowards to be honest. The Developers didn't decide on a skin or even have a skin planned for Taliyah this year. The pro-players that won decided to make a skin for Taliyah. This skin they have been gloating about for months now was this one and they are taking credit for it. For years now they have been saying skins like this is not part of the normal skin rotation. I guess Taliyah is actually not getting a skin because she didn't have one made for her this year to begin with.

Im not a Talyiah player but a pool party or star guardian skin feels like it should had been a pretty good concept on a champion such as Talyiah and not seeing it happen this year seriously makes me wonder if we will even get a pool party skin release this year or a star guardian release.

Skins don't listen to fans confirmed...as with other usual riot Trivialities. Like how they were so shocked Butcher's Bridge was so popular. We've been asking for a Taliyah skin for a long while now, MORE SO for Star Guardian.

I wonder who they picked for the upcoming SG skins, I'm almost assured they don't fit.

> [{quoted}](name=GenoXx,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZAyJeXQx,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2018-06-27T16:51:16.863+0000)
>
> Skins don't listen to fans confirmed...as with other usual riot Trivialities. Like how they were so shocked Butcher's Bridge was so popular. We've been asking for a Taliyah skin for a long while now, MORE SO for Star Guardian.
> 
> I wonder who they picked for the upcoming SG skins, I'm almost assured they don't fit.

im interested as well lol

You did so well, Riot. Getting rid of the memes, now this. Come on, you have more than enough time (based on how long Illaoi's took) to make a skin this year for her, 2 more even. What's holding you back?

Ditch that Yi skin you are planning, ditch that Jhin one you are planning and make one for her instead.

can we just get a fucking tahm kench skin though

and one that isn't a joke one

Yeah I agree with this a lot as well.

The Vel'koz and Tahm Skin from last April Fools were so ew.
last last april fools lol

I mean is it so hard to have Surfer Taliyah ( they could also update Surfer Singed while they are at it) where she rides around on a surfboard everywhere and her ult is riding a huge wave, Her threaded volley could be a bunch of little Wake boards or swimming boards, her ability that throws stones all over the ground could be little sand castle's and the giant rock that knocks people into the mini sand castle's could be a giant crab standing up like it was under the champion and tossed them

Their brand new skin for Taliyah enjoy rito.

The skins team can create good products. However, they have fucking terrible judgment and decision making when it comes to which champs actually get the skins. 

Taliyah will be 3 years without a skin before they give her anything beyond the release skin.
Damn she's about to become the next Kalista at this rate...
It sucks ;(. I really wanted Kalista to get a non-esports skin and they keep giving it too her
